metadata.title: STANdard for drug Screening by COllaborative FIltering (stanscofi)
metadata.notes: If you use this software, please cite it as below.

grants.title: Robust Explainable Controllable Standard for drug Screening

metadata.description: Package for STANdard drug Screening by COllaborative FIltering. Performs benchmarks against datasets and SotA algorithms, and implements training, validation and testing procedures.
